summary: adds back in the victory cry from the Skyrim game play trailer
descriptionHtml:
Check out the Female Version with voice by Mimi Page over here!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6706



Dovahkiin Victory Cry
Version 2.0

In response to your amazing feedback and requests I have made
Lots of changes, ridiculous hours audio editing, but hey enjoy!
The male Dovahkiin victory cry, is louder and longer.
I\' m sure that many will be familiar after having watched the Skrim teaser trailer 100\'s of times. It\'s amazing and beautiful.
The audio quality of the music is superb.

I also whipped up a really cool Dragon Heart Beat Death, and when it\'s heart stop you absorb its soul.
Install this optionally.

The music can be included or excluded from all the versions

See the in game video and audio for all of these here;

Dovahkiin Victory Cry Male & Music
http://youtu.be/tgv8BsPIe0E

Dovahkiin Victory Just Music
http://youtu.be/ZmSqkKvzEMM
author: gloomfrost

files.name: Silent Music for Dragon Slaying ALL words of power
